name: Say cheese! (Wiljunow)
description:
_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Say cheese!

Get the cheese, but beware!

Don't fall on the tablecloth or the cat will get you!

Featuring 3 levels :

Level 1 - "I forgot to buy groceries."

Level 2 - "CARBS"

Level 3 - "We couldn't agree on what to order for dinner."

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

- ZQSD or arrow keys : Walk

- A, E or move the mouse left/right : Rotate the camera

- Spacebar or mouse (left click) : Jump

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Music

"Two Finger Johnny" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Game made for a school project (Gamagora Lyon)
